Journal Articles

  1. Mapping the 3D Orientation of Piconewton Integrin Traction Forces, J.M. Brockman, A.T. Blanchard, V. Ma, W.D. Derricotte, Y. Zhang, W.A. Lam, F.A. Evangelista, K. Salaita, A.L. Mattheyses. Nature Methods 15, 115. 2018


  2. Localized Intrinsic Valence Virtual Orbitals for the Automated Interpretation of Core Excited States, W.D. Derricotte and F.A. Evangelista. J. Chem. Theory Comput. 13, 5984. 2017

  3. Development and Applications of Orthogonality Constrained Density Functional Theory for the Accurate Simulation of X-Ray Absorption Spectroscopy, W.D. Derricotte. PhD Thesis. Emory University 2017.
  4. Predicting Near Edge X-ray Absorption Spectra with the Spin-Free Exact-Two-Component Hamiltonian and Orthogonality Constrained Density Functional Theory. P. Verma, W.D. Derricotte, F.A. Evangelista. J. Chem. Theory Comput. 12, 144. 2016


  5. Simulation of X-Ray Absorption Spectra with Orthogonality Constrained Density Functional Theory. W.D. Derricotte and F.A. Evangelista. Phys. Chem. Chem. Phys. 17, 14360. 2015
